verses.text: Give attention \w to|strong="H1121"\w* this, all you peoples; let \w your|strong="H1121"\w* ears \w be|strong="H1121"\w* open, all you \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* living \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* world.

High \w and|strong="H8085"\w* low \w together|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poor, \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* wealth.

\w From|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H1571"\w* mouth \w will|strong="H0376"\w* come words \w of|strong="H1121"\w* wisdom; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* thoughts \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1571"\w* heart \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* knowledge.

\w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w put|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* teaching into \w a|strong="H1696"\w* story; \w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* make \w my|strong="H1696"\w* dark sayings clear \w with|strong="H1696"\w* music.

What cause have I \w for|strong="H3658"\w* fear \w in|strong="H2420"\w* \w the|strong="H5186"\w* days \w of|strong="H0241"\w* evil, when \w the|strong="H5186"\w* evil-doing \w of|strong="H0241"\w* those who \w are|strong="H0241"\w* working \w for|strong="H3658"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* downfall is round about me?

Even \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w those|strong="H5437"\w* whose faith \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* wealth, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* whose hearts \w are|strong="H3117"\w* lifted up \w because|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* stores.

Truly, no man may get back \w his|strong="H5921"\w* soul \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* price, or give \w to|strong="H5921"\w* God \w the|strong="H5921"\w* payment \w for|strong="H5921"\w* himself;

(Because \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w takes|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* \w price|strong="H6299"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* keep \w his|strong="H5414"\w* soul \w from|strong="H0376"\w* death, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* able \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.)
So \w that|strong="H5315"\w* he might have \w eternal|strong="H5769"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w never|strong="H5769"\w* see the underworld.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* wise men come \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* foolish persons \w of|strong="H3808"\w* low behaviour come \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7845"\w* together, letting \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w wealth|strong="H3808"\w* go \w to|strong="H7200"\w* others.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* place \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w is|strong="H3684"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* house \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* resting-place \w through|strong="H3684"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* generations; \w those|strong="H2450"\w* \w who|strong="H2450"\w* come \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w give|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* names \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* lands.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* man, \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* animals, does not go \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*; \w he|strong="H5921"\w* comes \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H7121"\w* end \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* beasts.

This \w is|strong="H0120"\w* the way \w of|strong="H0120"\w* the foolish; their silver \w is|strong="H0120"\w* \w for|strong="H0929"\w* \w those|strong="H0120"\w* \w who|strong="H0120"\w* come \w after|strong="H0929"\w* them, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* their children get the pleasure \w of|strong="H0120"\w* their gold. (Selah.)

Death \w will|strong="H2088"\w* give \w them|strong="H0310"\w* \w their|strong="H0310"\w* food \w like|strong="H1870"\w* sheep; \w the|strong="H0310"\w* underworld \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w their|strong="H0310"\w* fate \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w they|strong="H0310"\w* \w will|strong="H2088"\w* go \w down|strong="H1870"\w* \w into|strong="H2088"\w* \w it|strong="H0310"\w*; \w their|strong="H0310"\w* flesh \w is|strong="H2088"\w* food \w for|strong="H2088"\w* worms; \w their|strong="H0310"\w* form \w is|strong="H2088"\w* wasted \w away|strong="H0310"\w*; \w the|strong="H0310"\w* underworld \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w their|strong="H0310"\w* resting-place \w for|strong="H2088"\w* \w ever|strong="H2088"\w*.

But God \w will|strong="H3477"\w* get back \w my|strong="H1242"\w* soul; \w for|strong="H4194"\w* \w he|strong="H1242"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* take me \w from|strong="H7585"\w* \w the|strong="H1242"\w* power \w of|strong="H4194"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*. (Selah.)

\w Have|strong="H3027"\w* no fear \w when|strong="H3588"\w* wealth comes \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* glory \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* house \w is|strong="H0430"\w* increased;

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* death, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* take \w nothing|strong="H0408"\w* away; \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* go \w down|strong="H3588"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* might \w have|strong="H3605"\w* pride \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* life-time, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H3947"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3381"\w* well \w for|strong="H3588"\w* yourself,

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w go|strong="H3190"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* generation \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* fathers; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* see \w the|strong="H3588"\w* light again.

\w Man|strong="H7200"\w*, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* animals, \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*; \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w comes|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H7200"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* beasts.
